survey_name: Workplace Learning and Development Needs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employees' learning and development needs to enhance professional growth and organizational effectiveness.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current learning and development opportunities provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current learning and development opportunities provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: Which of the following learning and development areas are most important to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: Which of the following learning and development areas are most important to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other learning and development areas important to you.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture additional input. Keep it optional.

script.question_text: Please specify any other learning and development areas important to you.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in learning and development activities provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use clear frequency options. Ensure the question is concise.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in learning and development activities provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you face in participating in learning and development activities? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: What barriers do you face in participating in learning and development activities? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other barriers you face in participating in learning and development activities.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture additional input. Keep it optional.

script.question_text: Please specify any other barriers you face in participating in learning and development activities.

questions.question_text: How effective do you find the current learning and development programs in meeting your professional goals?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How effective do you find the current learning and development programs in meeting your professional goals?

questions.question_text: What format do you prefer for learning and development activities? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: What format do you prefer for learning and development activities? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other preferred formats for learning and development activities.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture additional input. Keep it optional.

script.question_text: Please specify any other preferred formats for learning and development activities.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your organization's learning and development programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your organization's learning and development programs to a colleague?
